title: The Future of Healthcare: A Conversation with Scott Sperling
description: Scott Sperling, co-CEO of private-equity firm Thomas H. Lee Partners, and chairman of MassGeneralBrigham, the parent of Harvard University's teaching hospitals, joins Barron's senior managing editor Lauren R. Rublin and healthcare reporter Josh Nathan-Kazis for a discussion about healthcare innovation, investment, and policy in the post-Covid era.
